Hello, world!


click image to open

We have data.

ExploreVR is a web application that provides state vocational rehabilitation (VR) agencies easy and convenient access to a range of VR and related data for planning, evaluation, and decision-making. Overall, this data-sharing effort seeks to increase knowledge about the public VR program and its role within the larger employment and disability service system within and across states and territories.

Learn more »

Explore Maps

Explore sets of data using our Google Maps-powered overlay tools and Socrata mapping tools.

View parent agency/location data »

View collaboration data »

Explore Charts

Use Socrata Open Data tools to interact with our large data sets or simply download data in multiple formats to view in your own applications.

View reallotment data »

View rehabilitation rate data »

View collaboration data »

Explore Findings

Explore our monthly issue of Review VR, which will provide a snapshot and analysis of VR data in an accessible format.
